title: Paramount Global and Citi surge after Berkshire Hathaway discloses new stakes

contentObject.content: Three of the new positions revealed in Berkshire Hathaway's (BRKA)13-F filing jumped in premarket trade on Tuesday. Paramount Global's B shares (PARA) bounced 10%, as Celanese (CE) rose 6% and Citigroup (C) rose 5%. Investors had already known that Warren Buffett's investment vehicle had invested heavily in Occidental Petroleum (OXY), Chevron (CVX) and HP (HPQ) during the first quarter.
